blitzEdit.storage

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • blitzEdit.storage.XMLParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IParser

    public class XMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements IParser
    Parser that uses xml format to save and load circuits and load blueprints.
    Author:
    Chrisian Gartner

        destination - Destination on disk

      • readBlueprint

        public static ComponentBlueprint readBlueprint(java.lang.String filepath)
        Reads an xml file and extracts the strings used for a ComponentBlueprint. Calls readBlueprintValues() to interpret the extracted strings Displays message if error occured.
        Parameters:
        filepath - Contains filepath on disk
        Returns:
        ComponentBlueprint Created blueprint

      • readBlueprintValues

        private static ComponentBlueprint readBlueprintValues(java.lang.String component,
                                                      java.lang.String svg,
                                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> connectors,
                                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> properties,
                                                      java.io.File parentDirectory)
        Reads the strings given as parameter for xml properties and creates a ComponentBlueprint with them.
        Parameters:
        component - Contains the xml for the component
        svg - Contains the xml for the svg image
        connectors - Contains the xml for the connectors
        properties - Contains the xml for the propertiers
        parentDirectory - Contains the parent directory
        Returns:
        ComponentBlueprint Creted blueprint

      • readComponent

        private boolean readComponent(java.lang.String xml)
        Creates a component element out of the given xml string. Doesn't create connectors.
        Parameters:
        xml - Contains xml properties for the component
        Returns:
        boolean True if succesfully created component and added to elements array

      • readConnector

        private boolean readConnector(java.lang.String xml)
        Creates a connector out of given xml string.
        Parameters:
        xml - Contains properties for connector
        Returns:
        boolean True if succesfully created connector and added to elements array

      • createConnection

        private boolean createConnection(java.lang.String xml)
        Creates a conenction out of the given xml string.
        Parameters:
        xml - Contains IDs for the both connectors to connect
        Returns:
        boolean True if conenction between two connectors created

      • addComponentChilds

        private boolean addComponentChilds(java.lang.String xml)
        Sets the owner of a connector to the component given in the xml string.
        Parameters:
        xml - Contains xml properties for owner and connector id
        Returns:
        boolean True if succesfully set the owner of the connector

      • saveComponent

        private java.lang.String saveComponent(Component comp,
                                       int id)
        Creates a string with the properties of a component. Adds a hash if hashes are activated.
        Parameters:
        comp - Component to save
        id - Position in the elements array
        Returns:
        String Contains the properties as string

      • saveConnector

        private java.lang.String saveConnector(Connector conn,
                                       int id)
        Creates a string with the properties of a connector. Adds a hash if hashes are activated.
        Parameters:
        conn - Connector to save
        id - Position in the elements array
        Returns:
        String Contains the properties as string

      • saveConnection

        private java.lang.String saveConnection(Connector conn,
                                        Connector conn2)
        Creates a string with IDs (index in elements array) of the two connectors. Adds a hash if hashes are activated.
        Parameters:
        conn - 1st connector
        conn2 - 2nd connector
        Returns:
        String Contains the connection as string

      • saveComponentChilds

        private java.lang.String saveComponentChilds(Component comp)
        Creates a string with the IDs of the component and its children. Adds a hash if hashes are activated.
        Parameters:
        comp - Component used for save
        Returns:
        String Contains the component and its childs

      • checkHash

        private boolean checkHash(java.lang.String hash,
                          java.lang.String xml)
        If ignoreHash is false creates a hash with the given xml string without special characters and the hash. Checks the created hash against the given hash string afterwards.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash code of the xml string
        xml - Xml string to check
        Returns:
        boolean True if hash matches the created xml hash

      • createHash

        private java.lang.String createHash(java.lang.String xml)
        Uses String.hashCode() to generate a hash code for the xml string.
        Parameters:
        xml - String to generate hash for
        Returns:
        String Contains hash code

      • createCircuitHash

        private java.lang.String createCircuitHash(java.lang.String xml)
        Deletes all special character and uses String.hashCode() afterwards. Inserts the hash into a xml property <circuithash hash=""\> and returns the string.
        Parameters:
        xml - Xml used for saving
        Returns:
        String Contains the xml property with the created hash

      • checkCircuitHash

        private boolean checkCircuitHash(java.lang.String hash,
                                 java.lang.String xml)
        Removes all special characters, xmlTag and circuit xml tags and uses String.hashCode() afterwards. Then checks the given hash against the created.
        Parameters:
        hash - Hash to check
        xml - Xml containing the circuit
        Returns:
        boolean True if hash matches
